entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 11:28 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -9.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
